admirer.translation[0].definitions[0].de: someone who likes a person and thinks that they are attractive
admirer.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: a beautiful woman with many admirers
admirer.translation[0].definitions[1].de: someone who respects a famous person, especially because they like their work
admirer.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: ‘I’m a great admirer of yours, ’ she managed to stammer.
